statements: SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT department, title FROM regulations WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT id, title, department FROM regulations WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE title ILIKE '%data%';
SELECT id, title, description FROM regulations WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT id, title, department FROM regulations WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, title, description, department FROM regulations WHERE department = 'HR' AND created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY department, title;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE id = '8cb8aa13-a09f-463b-b4fb-37073acf775d';
SELECT id, title, created_at FROM regulations WHERE title ILIKE 'cyber%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE regulation_id = 2;
SELECT policy_description, policy_name FROM policies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE regulation_id = 1 ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations JOIN policies ON regulations.id = policies.regulation_id WHERE regulations.id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulations LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_name, category FROM regulations WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, policy_text, policy_effective_date FROM policies WHERE regulation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE responsible_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, department_name, responsible_person FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations ORDER BY id DESC, category ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT policy_name, description FROM regulations WHERE category = 'Safety'
SELECT policy_name, description FROM regulations WHERE id in (2, 5, 8)
SELECT * FROM policies INNER JOIN regulations ON policies.regulation_id = regulations.id ORDER BY policies.id DESC
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE department_name = 'HR'
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id = 1;

SELECT d.department_name, p.policy_name, p.policy_description FROM departments d JOIN department_policies dp ON d.department_id = dp.department_id JOIN policies p ON dp.policy_id = p.policy_id ORDER BY d.department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies WHERE regulation_id = 2;
SELECT department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;

SELECT policies.policy_name, departments.department_name FROM policies INNER JOIN department_policies ON policies.policy_id = department_policies.policy_id INNER JOIN departments ON department_policies.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT regulation_name, COUNT(*) AS policy_count FROM regulations LEFT JOIN policies ON regulations.regulation_id = policies.regulation_id GROUP BY regulation_name ORDER BY policy_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulations;
SELECT title, description FROM regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policies ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, effective_date FROM policies WHERE policy_number = 1001;
SELECT agency_name, address FROM agencies WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM regulations ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE effective_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agency_name, contact_person FROM agencies WHERE address ILIKE '%California%';

SELECT regulations.title, policies.policy_number, categories.category_name FROM regulations JOIN policies ON regulations.id = policies.id JOIN categories ON categories.id = policies.id ORDER BY categories.category_name DESC;
